Package JSci.maths.wavelet.splines

Linear splines have infinite support and are continuous.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
LinearSpline This class is used to generate linear splines to be used as wavelets or related functions.
PiecewiseConstant This class is used to generate piecewise constant splines to be used as wavelets or related functions.
QuadraticSpline This class is used to generate quadratic splines to be used as wavelets or related functions.
Spline This class is meant as an abstract encapsulation for spline objects.
SumOfDiracs This class is used to generate sum of Diracs (splines of order 0) to be used as wavelets or related functions.
 

Package JSci.maths.wavelet.splines Description

Linear splines have infinite support and are continuous.
